languages.text: {n}Доза стимулятора сводит конечности старика судорогой столь мощной, что, кажется, его сердце вот-вот разорвется. Но в глазах его появляется ясность. Бросив на вас взгляд, Абеляр судорожно вздыхает.{/n} "Кровь святых, Лорд-капитан! Вы живы!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Доза стимулятора сводит конечности старика судорогой столь мощной, что, кажется, его сердце вот-вот разорвется. Но в глазах его появляется ясность. Бросив на вас взгляд, Абеляр судорожно вздыхает.{/n} "Гроксово семя, Лорд-капитан! Вы живы!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}The dose of stimulant sends such an intense spasm down his limbs that you fear his heart might rupture... but then clarity brightens his gaze. Abelard looks at you and takes a shuddering breath.{/n} "Saints' blood, Lord Captain! You're alive!"
languages.original_text: {n}Доза стимулятора сводит конечности старика судорогой столь мощной, что, кажется, его сердце вот-вот разорвется. Но в глазах его появляется ясность. Бросив на вас взгляд, Абеляр судорожно вздыхает.{/n} "Кровь святых, Лорд-капитан! Вы живы!"

traits.locale_text: {n}A dose of the stimulant sends such an intense spasm down his limbs that you fear his heart might rupture... but then clarity brightens his gaze. Abelard looks at you and takes a shuddering breath.{/n} "Grox seed, Lord Captain! You're alive!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The dose of stimulant sends such an intense spasm down his limbs that you fear his heart might rupture... but then clarity brightens his gaze. Abelard looks at you and takes a shuddering breath.{/n} "Saints' blood, Lord Captain! You're alive!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}増強剤を投与すると、彼の手足は激しく痙攣し、心臓が破裂するのではないかと心配になる…だが目に明瞭さが戻ってきた。アベラルドはあなたを見て、呼吸を震わせた。{/n}「信じられない！ロード・キャプテン！生きていたのですね！」
languages.original_text: {n}The dose of stimulant sends such an intense spasm down his limbs that you fear his heart might rupture... but then clarity brightens his gaze. Abelard looks at you and takes a shuddering breath.{/n} "Saints' blood, Lord Captain! You're alive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}増強剤を投与すると、彼の手足は激しく痙攣し、心臓が破裂するのではないかと心配になる…だが目に明瞭さが戻ってきた。アベラルドはあなたを見て、呼吸を震わせた。{/n}「信じられない！ロード・キャプテン！生きていたのですね！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}一剂兴奋剂打下去之后，阿贝拉德的四肢剧烈痉挛起来。你以为他的心脏会裂开……但随后，他的目光变得清晰起来。阿贝拉德看着你，颤抖着吸了口气。{/n}“圣人之血在上，舰长大人！您还活着！”
languages.original_text: {n}The dose of stimulant sends such an intense spasm down his limbs that you fear his heart might rupture... but then clarity brightens his gaze. Abelard looks at you and takes a shuddering breath.{/n} "Saints' blood, Lord Captain! You're alive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}一剂兴奋剂打下去之后，阿贝拉德的四肢剧烈痉挛起来。你以为他的心脏会裂开……但随后，他的目光变得清晰起来。阿贝拉德看着你，颤抖着吸了口气。{/n}“我的老天，舰长大人！您还活着！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}La dosis de estimulante provoca un espasmo tan intenso en sus miembros que temes que su corazón se rompa... pero entonces la claridad ilumina su mirada. Abelard te mira y respira entrecortadamente.{/n} «¡Por los santos, Lord Capitán! ¡Está {mf|vivo|viva}!».
languages.original_text: {n}The dose of stimulant sends such an intense spasm down his limbs that you fear his heart might rupture... but then clarity brightens his gaze. Abelard looks at you and takes a shuddering breath.{/n} "Saints' blood, Lord Captain! You're alive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una dosis de estimulante provoca un espasmo tan intenso en sus miembros que temes que su corazón se rompa... pero entonces la claridad ilumina su mirada. Abelard te mira y respira entrecortadamente.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! ¡Está {mf|vivo|viva}!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Dosis des Stimulans jagt einen derart heftigen Krampfanfall durch seine Glieder, dass du fürchtest, sein Herz könnte platzen ... doch dann klart sein Blick auf. Abelard sieht dich an und atmet schaudernd durch.{/n} "Beim Blut der Heiligen, Lord Captain! Ihr lebt!"
languages.original_text: {n}The dose of stimulant sends such an intense spasm down his limbs that you fear his heart might rupture... but then clarity brightens his gaze. Abelard looks at you and takes a shuddering breath.{/n} "Saints' blood, Lord Captain! You're alive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Dosis des Stimulans jagt einen solch heftigen Krampfanfall durch seine Glieder, dass du fürchtest, sein Herz könnte platzen ... doch dann klart sein Blick auf. Abelard sieht dich an und atmet schaudernd durch.{/n} "Groxsaat, Lord Captain! Ihr lebt!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une dose de stimulant et Abélard se met à convulser, à tel point que vous craignez de voir son cœur lâcher... mais au bout d'un certain temps, son regard semble s'illuminer. Il pose les yeux sur vous et il s'exclame, la voix tremblante :{/n} « Par le sang des saints, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Vous êtes en vie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The dose of stimulant sends such an intense spasm down his limbs that you fear his heart might rupture... but then clarity brightens his gaze. Abelard looks at you and takes a shuddering breath.{/n} "Saints' blood, Lord Captain! You're alive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une simple dose du stimulant et Abélard se met à convulser, à tel point que vous craignez de voir son cœur lâcher... mais au bout d'un certain temps, son regard semble s'illuminer. Il pose les yeux sur vous et il s'exclame, la voix tremblante :{/n} « Nom d'un grox, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Vous êtes en vie ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Uyarıcı dozuyla Abelard'ın uzuvları o kadar yoğun bir şekilde kasılıyor ki kalbinin durmasından korkuyorsun... Derken Abelard'ın gözündeki perde kalkıyor. Sana bir bakış atıp ürpererek nefes alıyor.{/n} "Azizler alsın canımı! Lord Kaptan! Hayattasınız!"
languages.original_text: {n}The dose of stimulant sends such an intense spasm down his limbs that you fear his heart might rupture... but then clarity brightens his gaze. Abelard looks at you and takes a shuddering breath.{/n} "Saints' blood, Lord Captain! You're alive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Uyarıcı dozuyla Abelard'ın uzuvları o kadar yoğun bir şekilde kasılıyor ki, kalbinin durmasından korkuyorsun... Derken Abelard'ın gözündeki perde kalkıyor. Sana bir bakış atıp ürpererek nefes alıyor.{/n} "Azizler alsın canımı! Lord Kaptan! Hayattasınız!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
